name: Toshiba Carrier Corporation
membership: Toshiba Carrier Corporation is member of the following industrial associations : EPEE, JRAIA
goal: Participate EU legislation process related to refrigerants, environment, energy, ecodesign, ecolabel-programmes, resource-efficiency, buildings performance, recycling, and taxation
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: HFC policy, Ecodesign, Energy efficiency in buildings, REACH, RoHS, WEEE, EU public procurement directive, Emissions Trading Scheme
